entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
